main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Cynthiana, Kentucky, on December 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first noticed as a bright star-like object in the western sky before increasing in apparent size and becoming stationary., The object exhibited rapid, erratic flight characteristics and changed directions abruptly on several occasions., It was observed for approximately 20 minutes without any visible means of propulsion., The object was described as small and round, resembling the size of a basketball at arm's length., Another report on December 12, 1967, described a spherical object about 30 to 40 feet in diameter with a metallic appearance that emitted a reddish-orange glow.
witness description: observed a small, round, white object maneuvering silently across the sky
